description: Initial settlement NPCs for the Typed Leadership Simulator

npcs.name: Elena Thornwood
npcs.background: Former village elder from the eastern valleys. Skilled in diplomacy and agriculture. Lost her family to raiders and seeks a peaceful new beginning.

npcs.name: Marcus Ironhand
npcs.background: Veteran soldier who grew tired of war. Strong and dependable, he now protects the settlement while training others in combat.

npcs.name: Sister Mira
npcs.background: Devoted priestess of the old faith. Provides spiritual guidance and healing to the community. Known for her wisdom and compassion.

npcs.name: Finn Quicksilver
npcs.background: Traveling merchant with connections to distant lands. Charming and cunning, he seeks profit but has grown attached to this settlement.

npcs.name: Old Bran
npcs.background: Master blacksmith who has seen empires rise and fall. Gruff but fair, he forges the tools and weapons the settlement needs.

npcs.name: Lyra Sunweaver
npcs.background: Young farmer with dreams of innovation. She experiments with new farming techniques and believes the settlement can prosper through progress.

npcs.name: Darius Stone
npcs.background: Former captain of a mercenary company. Seeking redemption for past mistakes, he now guards the settlement with unwavering dedication.

npcs.name: Willow Brooks
npcs.background: Healer and herbalist trained by wandering monks. She tends to the sick and injured while maintaining the settlement's medicinal garden.

npcs.name: Jasper Coalheart
npcs.background: Former mine foreman. Knows where to find resources and how to organize labor. Practical and results-oriented.

npcs.name: Rosalind Fairweather
npcs.background: Educated scholar who fled a burning library. She maintains records, teaches children, and preserves knowledge for future generations.
